name: Wooly (Sarielle games)
description:
/!\ Don't mute the sound on the webGL version, it will crash. /!\

Wooly is a puzzle game made in a week by two beautiful persons where you control a wool ball that can attract different types of elements which will allow you to defend yourself, climb wall or even jump higher. Uses these abilities to resolves puzzles and have fun !

CREDITS

Solène Larcher 
Graphic Design / Level Design

François Candela 
Programming / Level Design / Sound Design

________________________

MUSIC

Cola Flavored by Public Pool

Sounds by FreeSound.org
https://freesound.org/
